md:
giải nghĩa từ "prescribes" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Prescribes (verb) /prɪˈskraɪb/:
	+ Meaning: to officially recommend or order the use of something, especially a medicine or a treatment.
	+ Type: verb
	+ Example sentence: "The doctor prescribes antibiotics to treat the infection."
	+ Related words: prescribe, prescription, prescribed
	+ Antonyms: prohibits, forbids

* Prescribes (verb) /prɪˈskraɪb/:
	+ Meaning: to lay down or dictate a rule or method for something.
	+ Type: verb
	+ Example sentence: "The government prescribes a set of guidelines for environmental protection."
	+ Related words: prescribe, prescription, prescribed
	+ Antonyms: allows, permits

* Prescribes (verb) /prɪˈskraɪb/:
	+ Meaning: to specify or dictate the exact form or structure of something.
	+ Type: verb
	+ Example sentence: "The architect prescribes the exact dimensions for the building design."
	+ Related words: prescribe, prescription, prescribed
	+ Antonyms: suggests, recommends
html:
giải nghĩa từ "prescribes" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

  • Prescribes (verb) /prɪˈskraɪb/:

    • Type: verb

  • Prescribes (verb) /prɪˈskraɪb/:

    • Meaning: to lay down or dictate a rule or method for something.
    • Type: verb
    • Example sentence: "The government prescribes a set of guidelines for environmental protection."
    • Related words: prescribe, prescription, prescribed
    • Antonyms: allows, permits

  • Prescribes (verb) /prɪˈskraɪb/:

    • Meaning: to specify or dictate the exact form or structure of something.
    • Type: verb
    • Example sentence: "The architect prescribes the exact dimensions for the building design."
